programmes.show_description: A Hit With A Bullet.
Court TV's team of world class journalists break down the day's breaking news stories and preview the next day's court docket.
Every weekday night on Court TV, Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the True Crime stories that are captivating the nation. Now, you can catch the sharp analysis and insightful interviews.

Every weekday night on Court TV, Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the True Crime stories that are captivating the nation. Now, you can catch the sharp analysis and insightful interviews.
A feud between two farmers leaves one man dead and small community in shock. How a dispute over land leads to murder, and the defendant claiming self-defense.
The disturbing case of Melanie McGuire, a fertility clinic nurse, shockingly accused of shooting her husband, dismembering his body and disposing of it in suitcases dumped into Chesapeake Bay.

programmes.show_name: TRIAL & ERROR: Why Did OJ Win?
programmes.show_description: This limited series takes a new look at the case that launched the nation's obsession with true crime: The O.J. Simpson case. What went right for the defense? What went wrong for the prosecution?
Every weekday night on Court TV, Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the True Crime stories that are captivating the nation. Now, you can catch the sharp analysis and insightful interviews.
Kickstart Court TV's compelling trial day ahead. Joined by a team of top trial attorneys and forensic experts, Grant covers the high-stakes trials that are on the docket, and the true crime cases!
Your Front Row Seat to Justice. Taking you beyond the headlines and into the courtroom, with in-depth legal reporting and expert analysis of the most important and compelling trials.

Every weekday night on Court TV, Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the True Crime stories that are captivating the nation. Now, you can catch the sharp analysis and insightful interviews.
A wife is accused of murdering her husband, whose corpse had been hidden in a closet for over a year. Witness this incredible investigation, trial and the surprising sentence that followed.
Tyler Clementi and Dharun Ravi were new college roommates when Ravi secretly live streamed Tyler kissing another man. Soon after Tyler committed suicide and Ravi faced surprising criminal charges.
